Abstrak:
Purpose: Rules and ethics of authorship for scientific papers are reviewed. Those authorship criteria specific to American Speech-Language-Hearing Association journals are reviewed as well as those required by journals in related fields.
Conclusions: The importance of first author status for students publishing their doctoral dissertation research is stressed as well as the need to discuss and resolve authorship status for all investigators early in the research process. The authorship criteria for the journal of choice are mandatory, and thisnecessitates educating all authors regarding theexisting requirements.
Kata Kunci: AUTHORSHIP; ETHICS; ACADEMIC dissertations; AUTHORS; PUBLISHERS & publishing; SERIAL publications; AMERICAN Speech-Language-Hearing Association; Independent Artists, Writers, and Performers; Independent writers and authors; Other publishers; Book Publishers; All Other Publishers
Sumber: Journal of Speech, Language & Hearing Research
